DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to assess improvement in visual evoked potential, cognition, fatigue, micturation and walking impairment under 3 months of Fampyra treatment
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency of 4-aminopyridin (Fampyra) on Gait, Vision, Cognition, Fatigue and Micturation in Patients With Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: All patients who according to the compound's Norwegian prescription guidelines are deemed eligible for the study, i.e. MS patients with impaired walking as determined by an EDSS 47. They do not need a past history of optic neuritis, cognitive failure, fatigue or difficulties micturating. MS patients with contraindications to the compound according to the prescription guidelines. Patients who have been exposed to Fampyra in the past Patients with an MS attack within last 3 months
